timeline.message:
Migrate pxf-json to Spring Boot

- Update top level build.gradle to include pxf-json
- Add new build.gradle for pxf-json
- all existing unit tests should be ported to junit 5
- make test on java 11
- automation tests passing for JSON

Co-authored-by: Francisco Guerrero <aguerrero@pivotal.io>
Co-authored-by: Alexander Denissov <adenissov@pivotal.io>
